title: Planets Fact
description: A website that displays certain information about the selected planet. Mapped data from a JSON file and used hooks in handling states.

title: Maze Generator
description: This project was created following a Youtube tutorial. Added a functionality where the user can select the number of grid being rendered.

title: Photosnap
description: A marketing site for a photo-sharing app. Built reusable components using Compound Component pattern.
